com.util

类 ChartDataJsonCreater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.util.ChartDataJsonCreater

  • public class ChartDataJsonCreater
extends java.lang.Object
    用于将数据转换为支持Chart.js插件的结构化json数据

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ChartDataJsonCreater() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String getLineJson(double[][] data, java.lang.String[] dataLabels, java.lang.String[] backgroundColor, java.lang.String[] borderColor, java.lang.String[] labels, java.lang.String title)
      返回折线图json { type: 'line', data: { labels: [["June","2015"], "July", "August", "September", "October", "November", "December", ["January","2016"],"February", "March", "April", "May"], datasets: [{ label: "My First dataset", fill: false, backgroundColor: window.chartColors.red, borderColor: window.chartColors.red, data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor() ] }, { label: "My Second dataset", fill: false, backgroundColor: window.chartColors.blue, borderColor: window.chartColors.blue, data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor() ], }] }, options: { responsive: true, title:{ display:true, text:'Chart with Multiline Labels' }, } };
      static java.lang.String getPieJson(double[] data, java.lang.String[] backgroundColor, java.lang.String[] labels, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String position)
      返回饼图json type: 'pie', data: { datasets: [{ data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), ], backgroundColor: [ window.chartColors.red, window.chartColors.orange, window.chartColors.yellow, window.chartColors.green, window.chartColors.blue, ], label: 'Dataset 1' }], labels: [ "Red", "Orange", "Yellow", "Green", "Blue" ] }, options: { responsive: true }
      static java.lang.String getPolarAreaJson(double[] data, java.lang.String[] backgroundColor, java.lang.String[] labels, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String position)
      返回极地区域图json data: { datasets: [{ data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), ], backgroundColor: [ color(chartColors.red).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), color(chartColors.orange).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), color(chartColors.yellow).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), color(chartColors.green).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), color(chartColors.blue).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), ], label: 'My dataset' // for legend }], labels: [ "Red", "Orange", "Yellow", "Green", "Blue" ] }, options: { responsive: true, legend: { position: 'right', }, title: { display: true, text: 'Chart.js Polar Area Chart' }, scale: { ticks: { beginAtZero: true }, reverse: false }, animation: { animateRotate: false, animateScale: true } }
      static java.lang.String getRadarJson(double[][] data, java.lang.String[] dataLabels, java.lang.String[] backgroundColor, java.lang.String[] borderColor, java.lang.String[] pointBackgroundColor, java.lang.String[] labels, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String position)
      返回雷达图json type: 'radar', data: { labels: [["Eating", "Dinner"], ["Drinking", "Water"], "Sleeping", ["Designing", "Graphics"], "Coding", "Cycling", "Running"], datasets: [{ label: "My First dataset", backgroundColor: color(window.chartColors.red).alpha(0.2).rgbString(), borderColor: window.chartColors.red, pointBackgroundColor: window.chartColors.red, data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor() ] }, { label: "My Second dataset", backgroundColor: color(window.chartColors.blue).alpha(0.2).rgbString(), borderColor: window.chartColors.blue, pointBackgroundColor: window.chartColors.blue, data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor() ] },] }, options: { legend: { position: 'top', }, title: { display: true, text: 'Chart.js Radar Chart' }, scale: { ticks: { beginAtZero: true } } }
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      static void test() 
      static void testLine()

      • getPieJson

        public static java.lang.String getPieJson(double[] data,
                                          java.lang.String[] backgroundColor,
                                          java.lang.String[] labels,
                                          java.lang.String title,
                                          java.lang.String position)
                                   throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException,
                                          org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException,
                                          java.io.IOException
        返回饼图json type: 'pie', data: { datasets: [{ data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), ], backgroundColor: [ window.chartColors.red, window.chartColors.orange, window.chartColors.yellow, window.chartColors.green, window.chartColors.blue, ], label: 'Dataset 1' }], labels: [ "Red", "Orange", "Yellow", "Green", "Blue" ] }, options: { responsive: true }
        参数:
        data - 数据
        backgroundColor - 各个扇形区域颜色
        labels - 各个颜色对于标签名
        返回:
        抛出:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException
        java.io.IOException

      • getPolarAreaJson

        public static java.lang.String getPolarAreaJson(double[] data,
                                                java.lang.String[] backgroundColor,
                                                java.lang.String[] labels,
                                                java.lang.String title,
                                                java.lang.String position)
                                         throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException,
                                                org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException,
                                                java.io.IOException
        返回极地区域图json data: { datasets: [{ data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), ], backgroundColor: [ color(chartColors.red).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), color(chartColors.orange).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), color(chartColors.yellow).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), color(chartColors.green).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), color(chartColors.blue).alpha(0.5).rgbString(), ], label: 'My dataset' // for legend }], labels: [ "Red", "Orange", "Yellow", "Green", "Blue" ] }, options: { responsive: true, legend: { position: 'right', }, title: { display: true, text: 'Chart.js Polar Area Chart' }, scale: { ticks: { beginAtZero: true }, reverse: false }, animation: { animateRotate: false, animateScale: true } }
        参数:
        data - 各个扇形区域数据
        backgroundColor - 各个扇形区域对应颜色
        labels - 各个颜色对应标签名
        title - 标题
        position - 标题位置
        返回:
        抛出:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException
        java.io.IOException

      • getRadarJson

        public static java.lang.String getRadarJson(double[][] data,
                                            java.lang.String[] dataLabels,
                                            java.lang.String[] backgroundColor,
                                            java.lang.String[] borderColor,
                                            java.lang.String[] pointBackgroundColor,
                                            java.lang.String[] labels,
                                            java.lang.String title,
                                            java.lang.String position)
                                     throws org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException,
                                            org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        返回雷达图json type: 'radar', data: { labels: [["Eating", "Dinner"], ["Drinking", "Water"], "Sleeping", ["Designing", "Graphics"], "Coding", "Cycling", "Running"], datasets: [{ label: "My First dataset", backgroundColor: color(window.chartColors.red).alpha(0.2).rgbString(), borderColor: window.chartColors.red, pointBackgroundColor: window.chartColors.red, data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor() ] }, { label: "My Second dataset", backgroundColor: color(window.chartColors.blue).alpha(0.2).rgbString(), borderColor: window.chartColors.blue, pointBackgroundColor: window.chartColors.blue, data: [ randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor(), randomScalingFactor() ] },] }, options: { legend: { position: 'top', }, title: { display: true, text: 'Chart.js Radar Chart' }, scale: { ticks: { beginAtZero: true } } }
        参数:
        data -
        dataLabels -
        backgroundColor -
        borderColor -
        pointBackgroundColor -
        labels -
        title -
        position -
        返回:
        抛出:
        org.codehaus.jackson.JsonGenerationException
        org.codehaus.jackson.map.JsonMappingException
        java.io.IOException
